body.p: I am much indebted to you for your kind remembrance of me. I am going into Kent, for a few days, on Friday nextCD took his family on holiday to the Albion Hotel, Broadstairs 15â€“20 August., and shall be unfortunately prevented from availing myself of it. But I do not the less esteem it, believe me.

closer.salute: I am Dear Sir|Very faithfully Yours
